mean_en: control or power over somebody/something, especially in an unpleasant way; the fact of being the most important or common feature of something
sentence: The ambitious CEO hopes to lead the firm to world domination.
sentence_trans: 这位雄心勃勃的总裁希望带领公司赢得全球市场的支配地位。
word_etyma: dominat统治 + ion名词后缀 → domination统治
